thread.section_title: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc | www.townfairtire.com | 22 of 1307
thread.title: Joe -Customer
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Joe -Customer

author: Joe -Customer
title: Joe -Customer
text:
Arrived at 8:30am, finally finished installing tires at noon. Building itself is disgusting several holes in walls and generally filthy.
Service took forever, and my car sat (completed) for a long time until I asked for the third time what the status was. Price was more than I thought I would be paying as well.
